content: What does private example mean, please? Is there any difference between example and that?

what it normally means is that the definition is placed in the _private namespace and you can't refer to it after the current section ends. But example can't be referenced at all after the example itself is finished, because it doesn't place the definition anywhere, it just reverts the environment after ensuring that the definition is valid, so private has no meaning
but it's possible that it is not excluded from the grammar
Martin Dvořák has marked this topic as resolved.
